message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic about the time value of money. This offer won't last.
You were generous, I'll meet you halfway on that
Time is money Alice!  I'm offering a fair 50/50 split. Take it before inflation hurts us both.
Your 50/50 split wasn't so fair considering inflation
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant hit from inflation.  This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
